Name: Athens
Description: The capital and largest city of Greece, known for its ancient history and vibrant cultural life.

Name: Vyronas
Description: A residential area with a rich cultural life and a strong community spirit, located in the southern part of Athens.

Name: Galatsi
Description: A residential area in the northern part of Athens, known for its green spaces and local amenities.

Name: Dafni-Ymittos
Description: Known for its proximity to Mount Ymittos and its blend of residential areas with modern infrastructure.

Name: Zografou
Description: A largely residential area, home to many students due to its proximity to the University of Athens.

Name: Ilioupoli
Description: A suburban area in southern Athens, known for its green areas and family-friendly environment.

Name: Kesariani
Description: A historical area at the foot of Mount Hymettus, known for its natural beauty and proximity to the city center.

Name: Nea Filadelfeia-Nea Chalkidona
Description: A vibrant, mixed-use area known for its diverse population and central location in Athens.
